notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: B.B., H.R. and A.K. had the initial idea for the setup of the modelling experiment. A.K. did the programming and conducted the modelling study – runs of simulations, analysis of data, etc. A.K. and H.R. wrote the main manuscript and O.H.G. and B.B. reviewed and rearranged large parts several times. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
